patterns: last night, one vehicle cut of my internet fiber cable. now my internet is not working.
its not my fault. that truck cut off my wire. why do i pay for that?
responses: for drop wire damaged due to client rs.904 (rs.800+13%vat)  damaged due to govt/pole issues  rs.904 (rs.800+13%vat)
please visit the concern branch office sir/mam
